description.value:
You are a highly skilled scout, capable of providing your allies a timely warning of any danger. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Scout's Warning]{Scout's Warning} ranger feat.

When you're using the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Scout]{Scout} exploration activity, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls instead of a +1 circumstance bonus.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.bApp2BZEMuYQCTDM]{Scout} archetype.
